select.if:
select recipe_code, product_name, gross_weight, production_date from( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, p.* from (select @rownum:=0) as tmp, b_recipe p order by recipe_code desc ) as b_recipe
where rownum > (#{pagenum} - 1 ) * #{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum} * 20

select recipe_code, product_name, gross_weight, production_date from( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, p.* from (select @rownum:=0) as tmp, b_recipe p where product_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') order by recipe_code desc ) as b_recipe
where rownum > (#{pagenum} - 1 ) * #{amount} and rownum <= #{pagenum} * 20

mapper.select: select recipe_code, product_name, gross_weight, production_date from b_recipe where product_name like concat('%', #{search_text}, '%')

select.if: select count(*) from b_recipe where product_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.product_code, m.material_num, p.product_name AS material_name, e.name AS maker_name FROM b_recipe r JOIN material m ON r.recipe_code = m.recipe_code LEFT JOIN b_product p ON m.product_code = p.product_code LEFT JOIN b_emp e ON r.emp_code = e.emp_code WHERE r.recipe_code = #{rc}
